ABOUT

Hi! I'm Ayinde Sodiq. I'm a Nigerian-based Software Engineer, Data Analyst and a Miscrosoft Office Specialist. Enthusiastically connected with the web development industry and information technology for few years.

I considered myself a disciplined, open minded and proactive person who enjoys team work, willing to face new challenge and love exploring new ideas. I am a big Fan of TV series and I recently developed interest in Philosophy and Ethics.

Interested in both frontend and backend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.
